title: Prediction of Maximum Temperature record in Spain 1960-2023 by the means of ERA5 atmospheric geopotentials
summary: This work focuses on predicting extreme temperature events, specifically daily maximum temperature records, in the Iberian Peninsula from 1960-2023. It investigates the connection between these events and upper-level atmospheric covariates using an innovative approach.
usefulness_reason: The paper directly addresses "Spatio Temporal" aspects by analyzing temperature records over a specific geographical region (Spain/Iberian Peninsula) across a defined time period (1960-2023). It focuses on the spatial and temporal patterns of extreme temperature events.
